channel.title: Remake of Lamborghini (Not a Lamborghini any)
channel.description:
I remade MistaBigBoss lamborghini but now it looks like a regular car lol. Here are some pics Well it not so good.
New Front View [IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu60/tyang8/1.jpg[/img] Old Front View [IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu60/tyang8/4.jpg[/img] New Side View [IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu60/tyang8/3.jpg[/img] Old Side View [IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu60/tyang8/6.jpg[/img] New Bottom View [IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu60/tyang8/2.jpg[/img] Old Bottom View [IMG]http://i633.photobucket.com/albums/uu60/tyang8/5.jpg[/img]

item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

[quote=“tyang8, post:1, topic:310627”]I remade MistaBigBoss lamborghini but now it looks like a regular car lol. Here are some pics
Well it not so good.

New Front View

1.jpg800×600

Old Front View
4.jpg800×600

New Side View
3.jpg800×600

Old Side View
6.jpg800×600

New Bottom View
2.jpg800×600

Old Bottom View
5.jpg800×600
[/quote]

At least the second 1 is better than the first 1. The first 1 failed big time but the second 1 is ok but needs improvement

[quote=“Frell, post:9, topic:310627”]Needs more shape and detail, the below one is mine and its around 3k polys (Tried to make it as low poly as i can, but it also has stuff that can be spared). Try making it look like a car not a box.


[/quote]

HOLY FUCK THEY ARE AWSOME I MEAN IT THE DETAIL IS EPIC!!!

item.title: Remake of Lamborghini (Not a Lamborghini any)
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

[quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=407057.msg3014655#msg3014655 date=1257096149] [quote]But GODDAMN, Frell where the fuck did you learn to model like that?![/quote] those r pictures LOL [/quote]

No those aren’t pictures, those are actual models of his. If you look, you can see slight mis-shaped parts, but not much. Thats only because of the low-poly though.

I think he was sarcastic…either way its clearly a model because the tires are not textured, the windows are gray and there are no headlights…or mirrors lol…but other then that its good.

Read full topic

item.title: Remake of Lamborghini (Not a Lamborghini any)
item.dc:creator: @Pigrear Pigrear
item.description:
@Pigrear wrote:

[quote=“Ikoedlalampara, post:18, topic:310627”][quote author=Pigrear link=topic=407057.msg3013811#msg3013811 date=1257041842]
Cars in servers = NONONONONONONONO.
Guns in servers = Maybe, depending on what your using them for. As combat wepons, I dont think so. In order for it to be realistic, you would have to make it 100x more powerful than range weapons, which would throw off your whole server.
[/quote]
maybe the basic hand cannon projectiles and attack etc for a gun would work for a like a hunting skill

Also notice how most servers with cars all failed and just released in like a week :o[/quote]

Yeah i spose that could work.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:15, topic:310627”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=407057.msg3007362#msg3007362 date=1256502718]
Also, one tip. When your gonna do a lambo put some effort into it. Its not a car to be treated to settle with a half-ass job. Now that i started one, im gonna finish later. But here is what i have so far. Yes, it has alot of fixing to do, but i will do that.

Wire Frame:

(mod delete if needed, was just saying its a little half-assed.)
[/quote]That’s a lame super high poly trace, what does that prove? He’s making one for the RS client and that’s realy good for having that tiny poly limit of 2000…

But GODDAMN, Frell where the fuck did you learn to model like that?![/quote]

Simple, he practiced?

Read full topic

item.title: Remake of Lamborghini (Not a Lamborghini any)
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

its not bad but i personally think u couldoff asked me first then leech my stuff [br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 27, 2009, 12:21:20 pm[/size][hr]soz for 2 posts but i think of rsps as a chance to make ur fantasies come alive THIS IS FOR FUN oh and i know i’m not the best modeler but thats my first model ever [br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 27, 2009, 01:02:08 pm[/size][hr][quote=“badger41, post:8, topic:310627”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=407057.msg3007362#msg3007362 date=1256502718]
Also, one tip. When your gonna do a lambo put some effort into it. Its not a car to be treated to settle with a half-ass job. Now that i started one, im gonna finish later. But here is what i have so far. Yes, it has alot of fixing to do, but i will do that.
when i was makin the lambo it looked like this but ended like that

erzerzerezrzerezr.png1024×640

Wire Frame:

(mod delete if needed, was just saying its a little half-assed.)
[/quote]

Your not going to make a car that fits into the client that looks detailed… he made the car to fit into the client, so it snot half-assed,[/quote]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:10, topic:310627”][quote author=`Lewk_ link=topic=407057.msg3007260#msg3007260 date=1256498512]

zzzz I will not say much cause I know taharoks watching me sooo, This is not that good really cars shouldnt be in RS imo…guns and stuff maybe cause of hunting.[/quote]
Ya, cause back in the day, we had desert eagles, and m16 with acog.

thinking more along the line of muskets not “high tech” guns which they did have “back in the day” I know most people think that runescape is based waaaay back but if you think about what they have its not really.[/quote]
I was being sarcastic.
